sqlMap.select: SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* from ( SELECT openindex, storename, region, category, phone, email, address, name, inquire, to_char(rdate,'yyyy/mm/dd') rdate, category2, category3, userid, DECODE(status,'P','대기','N','거절','Y','완료') status FROM businessenter WHERE openindex IS NOT NULL AND status='P' ORDER BY rdate DESC) a )b

SELECT openindex, storename, region, category, phone, email, address, name, inquire, to_char(rdate,'yyyy/mm/dd') rdate, category2, category3, userid, DECODE(status,'P','대기','N','거절','Y','완료') status FROM businessenter WHERE openindex=#openindex#
